actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 96-266.

official_title: A resolution increasing the limitation on expenditures by the Committee on the Budget for the procurement of consultants and authorizing expenditure by such Committee for the training of its professional staff.

summary.text: Increases from $80,500 to $160,000 the limitation on expenditures by the Senate Committee on the Budget for the procurement of consultants. Authorizes expenditures by such committee for the training of its professional staff.

titles.title: A resolution increasing the limitation on expenditures by the Committee on the Budget for the procurement of consultants and authorizing expenditure by such Committee for the training of its professional staff.
